product_name: FCS Stand Up Paddleboard Touring Fin - 9 in.
long_description: Zigzagging your way across the lake can get awfully tiring when you're out for a long session on your paddleboard. The Surf Hardware FCS touring fin helps you track straight and save energy.
short_description: Zigzagging your way across the lake can get awfully tiring when you're out for a long session on your paddleboard. The Surf Hardware FCS touring fin helps you track straight and save energy.
